title: Mikage-Kun Wa Kaeritai!
alternative_title: 御影くんは帰りたい！; Mikage Wants to Go Home!
status: 御影くんは帰りたい！; Mikage Wants to Go Home!
description:
Description :
        The protagonist Mikage is working at a "super" black company. His desk is full of items to keep him awake, his face is filled with dark circles, and mountains of documents doesn't seem to be decreasing at all. In the midst of nothing but despair, a chuckling sound echoed from the "positive psychopath", Kohinata Haru. "Working overtime is fun, isnt it!!! Hang in there, Mikage! Don't give up! The last train hasn't left yet!"

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 2: Is It Hell To Come To Work On A Day Off?
